EmailTemplate.name: DO-EastCoast Push - 5.8.19
EmailTemplate.subject: 600+ Compliance leaders converge in 10 days, are you in?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Why attend Compliance Week 2019? Let us count the ways. Draw energy from the collective wisdom of 600+ compliance professionals, ask questions of our distinguished panelists, hear directly from regulators, and earn up to 19 CPE credits (and CLE).
T O P I C S » SEC Update and Hot Topics » Anti-Bribery & Corruption » AML and Sanctions » Embedding Ethics & Compliance Program » Data Privacy and Protection » Cross-Border Investigations » The Next Generation of Compliance
S P E A K E R S » Vice President and Chief Ethics and Compliance Officer, 3M Company » Global Compliance Officer, Alstom » Director, Global Sanctions & Anti-Corruption, Fidelity Investments » Chief Ethics & Compliance Officer, Kimberly-Clark » Vice President and Associate General Counsel, Salesforce » Chief Ethics & Compliance Officer, Tenneco » Chief Compliance and Ethics Officer, Volvo Cars
Join us and use code: CCO-VIP when registering for special pricing of $1,595* (an $800 savings).
Thanks {!Contact.FirstName}, I look forward to seeing you in DC!
Best Regards,
Donna
{!User.Name} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
*offer for new registrants only, not to be used in conjunction with other discount codes. Group rates don't apply.
Compliance Week 2019 | May 20-22 | Washington D.C.
